name: What if Daville was in Cave Flow
name_original: What if Daville was in Cave Flow
description:
This is just a Cave Flow Mod.

Cave Flow is a rhythm platformer game.

Original Game by Sharpeon

Here's the link to the game: https://sharpeon.itch.io/cave-flow

7 new stuff replaced:

1. Added 1 (or more than one) diamond in the background.

2. Added arows and painted the Metronome.

3. Added one ramp up and one ramp down.

4. Replaced water with lava.

5. Replaced the wagon (Also known as the player) with my skin.

6. Replaced "basicBeat" with a Piano C Note.

7. Replaced "bigBeat" with a Piano D Note.

Instructions:

Move by pressing any keyboard key to the beat.

Thank you for listening and have fun.
